name: Voice of Grimshear
description:
Jam game made in 2021, theme: Rightous shall forfeit (İyi olan kaybetsin)

 Play as Baduardo Ansatsusha, talentless but passionate bard who's willing to do everything she can to achieve fame, love and money!

WASD/Arrow keys

Enter to confirm, ESC to go back/quit in some menus.

Credits

  •  Coding/Story/Game Design: PsychoMale
  • Music: Kaan Salman
  • Pixel Art: ShySeel

SPOILER: THIS WILL RUIN THE STORY

If you don't understand what's going on with story and how it's related to Jam theme, here is the explanation.

 At first assassination, Baduardo is mocked by his other musician, but this might also be considered as a friendly joke, this is mostly up to how you interpret.

 After first assassination, Baduardo mentions that crowd is still cheering them as before, implying that killing that one musician didn't change anything.

 Whilst second and third assassinations, musicians says 'I want to be a musician like you' and 'You were on fire back there' implying they actually admire Baduardo. 

 After second assassination Baduardo talking about how made a mistake and choose the wrong targets this whole time. Even after killing last musician, crowds reaction didn't change.

 Truth is, even though Baduardo is the most talented, famous and loved musician among them, she was never enough in her own eyes. She always kept seeking aways to improve herself, being more famous, rich and loved, but in time, this process has become something she attached to more then her desire for fame, money and attention.
